INSTALLATION
CHIEF.ARCHITECT.V12.1.2.29.WORKING 
1. extract                  
2. install  setup.exe                
3. Copy file /GRB/Chief Architect X2.exe To C:Program FilesChief Architect
                         
Udate to CHIEF ARCHITECT 12.3.1.51.UPDATE_ONLY-GRB
1. extract                  
2. install Chief_Architect_v12.3.1.51_Update.exe                
3. Copy file /GRB/Chief Architect X2.exe To C:Program FilesChief Architect

Update to Chief_Architect_v12.4.0.23
1. extract                  
2. install Chief_Architect_v12.4.0.23_Update.exe
3. Copy file Chief Architect X2.exe to C:Program FilesChief Architect overwritting the existing file.
Do not auto-date ever!
Unless we find another update.;D

But some apps you can do that update,done it quite a few times.

Tip of the the torrent. I often try to update from the site of the program and many times it works.
I just create a restore point which I often do installing any program,and if the update doesnt work I just restore and good as new again.
